title: Utf8b8jrpa Who Should Lead Ethereum
text:
Synopsis
Ethereum is preparing for the Pectra hard fork while simultaneously considering leadership changes at the Ethereum Foundation, with Danny Ryan emerging as a potential strong candidate to lead the organization.

Key Insights
- Pectra hard fork is progressing, with Devnet 5 potentially the last network before testnet phase in early February
- Key technical improvements include:
  - Gas refund mechanism refinement (EIP-7623)
  - Base fee updates (EIP-7840)
  - BLS precompilation gas cost alignment (EIP-2537)
- Holesky testnet gas limits proposed to increase to 60 million after Pectra fork
- Danny Ryan, who previously left the Ethereum Foundation, is gaining community support to potentially lead the organization
- Ryan has expressed respect for current executive director Aya Miyaguchi while being considered for leadership
- The leadership transition comes at a critical time as Ethereum navigates scaling challenges
